name: Winter Maw (itch)
description:
Winter Maw is a first person survival horror maze runner. The player finds themselves in an old mining facility with no idea what has happened there. They must use the environment to their advantage in order to discover what had happened and ultimately escape. Each level contains an original short story to uncover.

This is the first release with more updates and episodes planned.

Leave us some feedback over on our facebook page! It will help us with future updates/letting us know about bugs we might have missed.
